snippet: "Mary Poppins" and "The Lion King" will present special performances as part of the Autism Theater Initiative.
abstract: "Mary Poppins" and "The Lion King" will present special performances as part of the Autism Theater Initiative.
lead_paragraph: Performances of the Disney musicals "Mary Poppins" and "The Lion King" will be the next Broadway shows to be presented by the Autism Theater Initiative, a program of the Theater Development Fund, the nonprofit organization that runs the TKTS discount ticket booths in New York. The "Mary Poppins" performance is on April 29 at 1 p.m. at the New Amsterdam Theater; The "Lion King" performance will be on Sept. 30 at 1 p.m. at the Minskoff Theater.

headline.main: New Broadway Performances Announced for Autistic Children and Families
